text: سَآءَ مَثَلًا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَأَنفُسَهُمۡ كَانُواْ يَظۡلِمُونَ

translation.en: How evil an example [is that of] the people who denied Our signs and used to wrong themselves
translation.id: Sangat buruk perumpamaan orang-orang yang mendustakan ayat-ayat Kami; mereka menzalimi diri sendiri
